They are often the only thing that can attenuate the monumental ignorance we see on both sides of the conservative/liberal abyss... that takes different forms within a constellation of beliefs and modes of identity, typically, and is central to sexual identity and identity politics in particular.  So the right believes the left are Satanists, whereas the left believe the right is so gullible they shouldn't be considered actual humans anymore. Both views are wack. Porn *IS* politics.
